message:
i almost never see a job in information technology in Egypt with salary range  , i understand the whole  "you get paid based on what you can do" concept but you as a company/start-up/project owner must have a range in mind when advertising for a job  , posting the range will just get you the right category of people you can afford .
 
i also notice there are absolutely no standards to local freelancing prices  , i challenge someone to offer the same project to 5 different developers/designers and getting the same prices or even close  , this is not limited to freelancing but to registered software companies (well  , maybe the big names monitor themselves and other companies with the same sizes and try to keep the game close so you will see they offer almost the same salary packages and also the same products/services prices  ) .

i see this in general is not good for the industry & open the door to lot of "Fahlawa" , i honestly have no idea how to price my coding service to anyone requesting it  , and asking for ranges from friends is almost pointless as each one see himself according to his previous payments and sometimes to this "ego" .

data.message: As long as the market is full with misinformed customers there will always be hustler companies trying to screw both developers and customers over their money and playing the man in the middle rule with no whatsoever added value where they achieve their margins by cutting it from both developrs salaries and the money invested by the customer..

Price depend on your experience and time and also depends on the customer and address of customer 
على سبيل المثال لما تبيع برنامج مخازن لعميل في قريه غير لما تبيعه لعميل في مدينه مع انه نفس البرنامج وكمان ممكن تبيع نفس البرنامج لمصنع بمبلغ اكبر بكتير
وانا اعتقد ان دي ميزة  ان الموضوع ملوش سعر ثابت

absolutely not  , i can always undermine your work by offering a "look" better product to your customers with lower price  , i can even highlight features in your product and convince him it is not essential  , and of course i can just reverse-engineer your product and sell it with lower price and claim i am the original (and customers don't care really ) , without rules everything is possible and survival to the meanest

والعجيب اني مرة اعلنت عن وظيفة مطور مواقع، هنا على الصفحة دي، وحطيت مبلغ واضح عشان اختصر الكام مكالمة وكام ايميل اللي حيوصلولنا فيهم طلب مبلغ المرتب..وكده كده سابقة الاعمال والسيرة الذاتية والمقابلة حيضمنوا المهارة..الرد عليا كان باستهزاء وتشكيك: وعلى أي أساس حددتي 4000..ليه مش 3 وليه مش 5 الاف..مش لما تشوفي الاول مستواه ايه...فشيلتوا خالص وريحت نفسي! عجباً لكم أيها الجيكس..حيرتونا والله!
المشكلة إنك تضيع وقتك و تروح تعمل إنترفيو و يبهروا بيك و شغلك و عاوزين يكتبوا العقد قبل ما تمشى و تيجى تتكلم عن الراتب اللى اللى إنتا عاوزه يقولولك كتييييييييير و إحنا منقدرش و أسلوب الشحاته يشتغل
موضوع تحديد المرتب في الاعلان تقريبا مفيش شركة بتعمله في أي مكان في العالم علشان فيه أسباب كتير من ضمنها المنافسة و حاجات تانية كتير

For the first question, I agree with what Fady said in the first comment. For the rest, i'm looking forward to apply what was said regarding finances in particular and freelancing in general from the Freelancer show podcast ( http://devchat.tv/freelancers ) when I leave my current job to start freelancing.
أكيد فيه استثنائات. انا بتكلم علي الاغلبيه (وعلشان كده استعمال كلمة "قريبا"). اعرف اجيب اعلان لميكروسوفت او جوجل او ابل او فيسبوك او ياهو فيه الأجر؟؟
It's a Culture Issue! How to get the Most Paying the Minimum!

It's not only about that. It's mainly business. In big companies for example, you don't want to publish your numbers so your competitor would just pay a little bit more and be done with it. Plus, sometimes you could find someone very special that you are willing to pay much more than everyone else. If everyone else would know the range of his salary, it would create a lot of negative politics at the office between him and his teammates. There are a lot of reasons why top 500 never do that
